Features

Management

Gain full control over your product and manage your product fleet

Storage

You can securely store all data and monitor and analyze it in real-time

Scalability

You can connect any number of devices to the cloud. We provide a stable connection for up to millions of devices

Over-The-Air Updates

Update your product software and roll out new features

Roles & Permissions

Manage the accesses of your employees and offer your customer a family administration

Hosting

We will gladly take over the hosting or support you with your own hosting on your servers

Security

We use PKI-based device identity, key generation via HSM, state-of-the-art encryption technologies and AI-based data leak detection

Data Protection

We adhere to the highest data protection standards according to German data protection law. This gives you full control over your data and that of your customers at all times

Smart Home

We offer connectivity to all major smart home platforms such as Amazon Echo (Alexa) and Google Home
